projects.title: Stock Market Investment platform
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a stock market investment platform using Spring Boot
- Displays real-time data
- Secured and user-friendly application

projects.title: Donation Managemnet Portal
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a donation management portal using HTML and CSS
- Allows donors to contribute food, clothing, money, and footwear
- Simple and user-friendly interface for seamless donation experience

projects.title: Web Based Robot Monotoring System
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a **web-based robot monitoring system** using **React** and **Webots** simulation
- Tracks and analyzes **real-time factory data**
- Enhances **operational visibility** and **efficiency**

projects.title: Task Manager
projects.bodyText:
- A simple Task Tracker web app made with **React**.
 - Uses **simple storage** to get, add, delete or update tasks.

projects.title: Shipyard website
projects.bodyText:
- A simple and responsive **Shipyard Website** built using **HTML, CSS, and JavaScript**.
- Showcases **shipyard services**, company information, and contact details with a clean and modern layout.
